name: Knight and fame demo 1.01
description:

If you have any suggestions or comments You can recommend it. **

Story

               You are a young knight named Harold Hutchson who has entered the noble feudal lands of Grailicia in the absence of a king. 

Harold came to this land for some purpose. But in this demo, only part of it will be revealed.

How to play

  - Use your mouse to click on people to talk. or get a quest

  - Use your mouse to click on the signs to go to the next area.

  - Weapons, shields and skills can be set to use in battle. There are 3 types of skills.

       1. Offensive is a physical attack with a weapon. add features such as double attack Attack and reduce defense, etc. Offensive is defeated by defensive.

       2. defensive is a defensive skill. such as using a protective shield It will be affected by the shield while defending. Or a counter that uses a defensive weapon and counters, etc. Defensive is defeated by special .

       3. special is a special attack that is the ultimate move of each person. It has a unique feature that is not deducted from defensive points like offensive skills, but special will be stopped if offensive skills are encountered.
